title: Is it permissible to charge training fees in installments from my salary if I make a certain amount
transcript: Nizar from India. Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Wa'laykumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Sheikh there is a term of ruling my further education where I That's the one thing and another is that I did not hear the first one Nizar. What is the ruling? Sheikh there is a terms of ruling in my further education where I pay my fees in installments that's the one thing and another is that they stipulate the condition in the contract that if they gonna train me for the job opportunities and end up being landed more than X amount of salary they will gonna charge the fees for my training from my current salary in installments. So is this halal or should I refrain from the second one and just getting my education in the first situation as described earlier. The second condition is what? The second condition is that they stipulate the condition in the contract that if they gonna train me for the job opportunities and I end up being landed more than X amount of the salary then they will gonna charge the fees for my training from my current salary in installments. No this is not permissible. You should not opt for this at all.
